title: Experiment
additional-note: A 1975 renewal for 'Poem' by Francis Golffing says it was published in the Winter 1948 issue of Experiment.  We find no poem by Golffing in that issue, but there is a poem by Golffing titled 'Poem' in the Summer 1946 issue (for which a 1975 renewal would be too late), as well as a poem by Golffing titled 'In Mememoriam E. Z.' in the Spring 1949 issue (for which a 1975 renewal would be too early).
